name: effect-schema-geojson
description: Effect Schema for GeoJSON types - comprehensive validation and parsing library

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.version:patch: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push origin "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.version:minor: pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push origin "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
scripts.version:major: pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push origin "v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')"
